title: Shi Shaoxia Ganjue Hao Gudan
synopsis: Shi Zhou Wu is the older brother of the Ren Tian Faction. He has dedicated himself to martial arts and has been oblivious to worldly affairs since he was a child. He is serious, does not smile and is often feared by the people around him. Once, at a martial arts conference, he was surrounded by too many knightly couples, this seriously stimulated his spirit, causing a feeling of invincible loneliness to haunt him. Therefore, he decided to find his own happy and predestined marriage...
